name: ltm-ai-kg-debug-observability
description: Manual debug / observability harness for the KG pipeline: text -> extracted assertions -> KG assert -> KG query -> packets -> active_memory_text.

pinDefaults.text:
Data was found by Starfleet in 2338. He was the sole survivor on Omicron Theta in the rubble of a colony left after an attack from the Crystalline Entity. He is a synthetic lifeform with artificial intelligence, designed and built by Doctor Noonien Soong in his own likeness.

His positronic brain allows him impressive computational capabilities. He experienced ongoing difficulties during the early years of his life with understanding various aspects of human behavior and was unable to feel emotion, inspiring him to strive for his own humanity. This goal eventually led to the addition of an "emotion chip", created by Soong, to Data's positronic net.

literalValue.subject: ex:claim-data-emotion-chip
literalValue.object: this goal eventually led to the addition of an emotion chip

attributes.evidence_quote: This goal eventually led to the addition of an "emotion chip"

inputs.label: assertions
inputs.description: List of {subject,predicate,object,...} assertion objects.

inputs.label: scope
inputs.description: run | session | global. Determines the owner_id when not explicitly provided.

inputs.label: span_id
inputs.description: Optional provenance pointer to a runtime span/artifact id.

inputs.label: owner_id
inputs.description: Optional explicit owner id override (advanced; normally derived from scope).

inputs.label: inherit_context
inputs.description: When true, seed the child run's context.messages from the parent's active context messages. If the pin is not connected, the node checkbox is used. Default: false.

inputs.label: assertions
inputs.description: List of {subject,predicate,object,...} assertion objects.

inputs.label: scope
inputs.description: run | session | global. Determines the owner_id when not explicitly provided.

inputs.label: span_id
inputs.description: Optional provenance pointer to a runtime span/artifact id.

inputs.label: owner_id
inputs.description: Optional explicit owner id override (advanced; normally derived from scope).

inputs.label: query_text
inputs.description: Optional semantic query. Requires embeddings to be configured in the host.

inputs.label: subject
inputs.description: Optional subject filter (case-insensitive exact match).

inputs.label: predicate
inputs.description: Optional predicate filter (case-insensitive exact match).

inputs.label: object
inputs.description: Optional object filter (case-insensitive exact match).

inputs.label: since
inputs.description: Optional observed_at lower bound (ISO8601).

inputs.label: until
inputs.description: Optional observed_at upper bound (ISO8601).

inputs.label: active_at
inputs.description: Optional validity window selector (ISO8601). Filters assertions active at that time.

inputs.label: scope
inputs.description: run | session | global | all (fan-out over run+session+global).

inputs.label: owner_id
inputs.description: Optional explicit owner id override (advanced; normally derived from scope).

inputs.label: min_score
inputs.description: Optional cosine similarity threshold (semantic query_text only). Range ~[-1..1]; start with 0.2–0.4.

inputs.label: max_input_tokens
inputs.description: Optional token budget for Active Memory packing (KG → prompt). If set, returns active_memory_text + packets.

inputs.label: model
inputs.description: Optional model id used for token estimation (improves budgeting accuracy).

inputs.label: limit
inputs.description: Max assertions to return (default 100).

outputs.label: packets
outputs.description: Packed Memory Packets (v0) for Active Memory injection (when max_input_tokens is set).

outputs.label: active_memory_text
outputs.description: Token-budgeted Active Memory block (when max_input_tokens is set).

outputs.label: packed_count
outputs.description: Number of packets included in active_memory_text.

outputs.label: dropped
outputs.description: Packets dropped due to the Active Memory token budget.

data.label: Render report (Markdown)
data.code:
def transform(_input):
    d = _input if isinstance(_input, dict) else {}

    def _sf(v):
        return v.strip() if isinstance(v, str) else ''

    def _n(v):
        try:
            if v is None or isinstance(v, bool):
                return 0
            return int(float(v))
        except Exception:
            return 0

    ingest_enabled = bool(d.get('ingest_enabled'))
    seed_demo = bool(d.get('seed_demo'))

    provider = _sf(d.get('provider'))
    model = _sf(d.get('model'))
    domain_focus = _sf(d.get('domain_focus'))
    scope = _sf(d.get('scope'))
    owner_id = _sf(d.get('owner_id'))

    extracted_count = _n(d.get('extracted_count'))
    asserted_count = _n(d.get('assert_count'))
    demo_count = _n(d.get('demo_assert_count'))

    browse_count = _n(d.get('browse_count'))
    browse_dropped = _n(d.get('browse_dropped'))
    browse_tokens = _n(d.get('browse_estimated_tokens'))

    loose_count = _n(d.get('loose_count'))
    loose_dropped = _n(d.get('loose_dropped'))
    loose_tokens = _n(d.get('loose_estimated_tokens'))

    strict_count = _n(d.get('strict_count'))
    strict_dropped = _n(d.get('strict_dropped'))
    strict_tokens = _n(d.get('strict_estimated_tokens'))

    browse_active = _sf(d.get('browse_active'))
    loose_active = _sf(d.get('loose_active'))
    strict_active = _sf(d.get('strict_active'))

    def _active_block(title, text):
        t = text if text else '(empty)'
        return f"### {title}\n```\n{t}\n```"

    lines = []
    lines.append('# KG Debug / Observability')
    lines.append('')
    lines.append('This flow validates: **seed/extract → assert → query → packets → Active Memory**.')
    lines.append('')
    lines.append('## How to test')
    lines.append('- Default is fast: `ingest_enabled=false`, `seed_demo=true` (no LLM calls).')
    lines.append('- For full LLM extraction: set `ingest_enabled=true` and set `seed_demo=false`.')
    lines.append('- After running, click each `memory_kg_query` step to open the **KG / Active Memory Explorer** (graph, search, path, live store queries).')
    lines.append('')

    lines.append('## Inputs')
    lines.append(f"- ingest_enabled: `{str(ingest_enabled).lower()}`")
    lines.append(f"- seed_demo: `{str(seed_demo).lower()}`")
    lines.append(f"- provider/model: `{provider or '—'}` / `{model or '—'}`")
    lines.append(f"- domain_focus: `{domain_focus or '—'}`")
    lines.append(f"- scope: `{scope or '—'}`" + (f" (owner_id={owner_id})" if owner_id else ''))
    lines.append('')

    lines.append('## Counters')
    lines.append('| stage | count |')
    lines.append('| --- | ---: |')
    lines.append(f"| demo seeded | {demo_count} |")
    lines.append(f"| extracted (LLM) | {extracted_count} |")
    lines.append(f"| asserted (LLM) | {asserted_count} |")
    lines.append(f"| snapshot (pattern) | {browse_count} |")
    lines.append(f"| semantic (loose) | {loose_count} |")
    lines.append(f"| semantic (strict) | {strict_count} |")
    lines.append('')

    lines.append('## Packing')
    lines.append('| query | estimated_tokens | dropped |')
    lines.append('| --- | ---: | ---: |')
    lines.append(f"| snapshot | {browse_tokens} | {browse_dropped} |")
    lines.append(f"| loose | {loose_tokens} | {loose_dropped} |")
    lines.append(f"| strict | {strict_tokens} | {strict_dropped} |")
    lines.append('')

    lines.append(_active_block('Active Memory (snapshot)', browse_active))
    lines.append('')
    lines.append(_active_block('Active Memory (loose)', loose_active))
    lines.append('')
    lines.append(_active_block('Active Memory (strict)', strict_active))
    lines.append('')

    result = '\n'.join(lines).strip() + '\n'
    summary = {
        'seeded_count': demo_count,
        'extracted_count': extracted_count,
        'asserted_count': asserted_count,
        'browse_count': browse_count,
        'loose_count': loose_count,
        'strict_count': strict_count,
    }
    return {'exec-out': True, 'result': result, 'summary': summary}
